T.F.K. - I checked the error log and did some poking around with procmon. It fails with a message stating that the Core package is missing.

I checked the XComGameCookedPCConsole directory and found that only the file Core.upk.uncompressed_size is present. From a quick check in that directory, it is not the only file that is missing in the same manner. Perhaps this is the missing files?

Wait, FLT made the mistake? How? Because people are using the 3DM, Unlocked and FLT versions of XCOM with the FLT crack and they aren't getting any startup crashes. And none of the release trackers list the crack as being nuked...

Wow, way to go guys! I never thought we would resolve this, seems like we're truly on our way :3

The issue with the torrent is probably the setup which is not compiled properly. During the installation it skips a huge amount of files, jumping from ~30% to 90%.

However, the .bat files are actually .arc archives when the extension is changed from .bat > .arc, but they are password protected.
If T.F.K. would be kind enough to provide us with the password, we could try to manually unpack the files and see if there are still issues.

The installer was all in weird symbols and shit. It completed but I'm missing quite a few files from the cookedpcconsole folder. Reinstalled and it skipped from 32%~ to 91%. I think this is all just a problem with the installer and we'll probably need a fix uploaded.

This is the best torrent I've found for XCOM:ET so far.  Others are saturated with peers but I got a solid 1MB/s from this one.  

I'm using W7 64bit with all current updates and it's working great for me.  3 hours in and zero crashes/glitches.

FIX THAT WORKED FOR ME:

Rename setup-1.bin to setup-2.bin and setup-2.bin to setup-1.bin.

To double check:
setup-1.bin should be the one that is ~506,000 KB
setup-2.bin should be the one that is ~1,427,000 KB 

Then reinstall

what I'll do is i will install it in order. afterwards i will rename setup bin 2, 3, 4 and 5 to setup bin 1 so that theoretically all files will be installed. do not cancel reinstallation since it will delete the folder

So here is the win combination :P

setup-1 506mb
setup-2 1030 mb
setup-3 1427 mb
setup-4 2504 mb
setup-5 139 mb

This worked for me :P
